main event: A sighting of a color-changing object was reported in Clearfield, Pennsylvania on 23 May 1955.
interesting points: The object changed colors from white to red,The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes,Two aircraft passed by the object without any radar detection,The object was described as appearing like a normal aircraft light but was determined not to be one,Ground visual observation was made without optical aids.
sighted object: A color-changing object appearing like a star in the sky
witness description: Individuals identified as Floyd Casady, Terry Cochran, and Hallie Turner, all qualified observers
